text: The Return of Vasili Bortnikov (, Vozvrashshyeniye Vasiliya Bortnikova) is a 1953 Russian drama movie directed by Vsevolod Pudovkin and was based on the novel The Harvest by Galina Nikolayeva. It stars Sergei Lukyanov, Vsevolod Sanayev, Klara Luchko, Inna Makarova, Nonna Mordyukova and was distributed by Mosfilm. ==Other websites== * Category:1953 drama movies Category:Russian drama movies Category:Movies based on books Category:Movies directed by Vsevolod Pudovkin
title: The Return of Vasili Bortnikov
